soccerbot

Class USPoller

  • java.lang.Object
    • soccerbot.USPoller

  • public class USPoller
extends java.lang.Object
    USPoller polls the Ultrasonic sensor every 50 ms for new data and updates the distance accordingly

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int distance 
      private SampleProvider us 
      private float[] usData 
      private EV3UltrasonicSensor usSensor 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      USPoller(EV3UltrasonicSensor myUSSensor)
      Takes in a EV3UltrasonicSensor object to being sampling

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDistance()
      Get the distance in cm sampled from the ultrasonic sensor and filter for any erroneous values over 255 cm
      void run()
      Continuously get the sampled data from the ultrasonic sensor and sleep for 50 ms

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
